text: A World Betrayed
Thank you for purchasing Mandate of Heaven. Make the most of new faction mechanics and discover the Three Kingdoms era from the outset of the Yellow Turban Rebellion.
Tao Qian - Free Character
Whispers abound of a growing bandit force south of the Yangtze. Yan Baihu, a new playable faction, is now available for free download. Click on the button below to find out more.
The Furious Wild
Yan Baihu - Free Character
Thank you for purchasing The Furious Wild. As a proud Nanman faction, work to unite the tribes and oppose the growing threat of the Han.
We hope you enjoy this new playable faction. Build your undercover network, take what is rightfully yours and lead your faction to power.

Between the fierce tribes of the Nanman and the noble Han, sits an influential member of the Imperial Government. Shi Xie, a new playable faction, is now available for free download. Click on the button below to find out more.
Mandate of Heaven
Fates Divided
We hope you enjoy this new playable faction. Make the most of his unique campaign and in-battle abilities to conquer the realm.
Expand your Total War: Three Kingdoms experience with the Mandate of Heaven chapter pack, available now. Click on the button below to find out more.
Expand your Total War: Three Kingdoms experience with The Furious Wild expansion pack, available now. Click on the button below to find out more.
Shi Xie – Free Character
Tao Qian awaits you! A new playable faction is available now for you to download for free. Click to find out more.
Fates Divided is available now! Determine the fate of China in the latest DLC and take control of over 20 powerful new units! Click the button below for more info.
We hope you enjoy playing as Shi Xie. You may be remote but make the most of the power you can exert and remember, it is all about who you know.
Thank you for purchasing Fates Divided! Lead Yuan Shao or Cao Cao to glory, or forge your dynasty in the shadow of their conflict.
Thank you for purchasing A World Betrayed. In the shadow of your father, lay waste to anyone that stands in your way.
A World Betrayed Chapter Pack is available now! Carve your own path with Lü Bu and Sun Ce. Click on the button below to find out more.
